Subject: Re: Directions for Scorp
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The cyber bee on its course ignores the laser fire burning around it, a few
times it is shaved by it, once being blasted but able to keep on Going. As
the two figuers in the sky pass by Scorponok emerges from a bush behind him
a shoots another missile at the now leaving figuers.
